subject: Design
title: Progressive Disclosure: Reveal Gradually
description: A quick win: understand Progressive Disclosure: Reveal Gradually.

hook.text: A TV remote has 50 buttons. You use 5. Progressive disclosure says: show the 5, hide the 45.

buildup.text: The principle is simple: show users only what they need now. Reveal complexity when they're ready.

discovery.text: Google's search page is progressive disclosure in action â€” one box, then results, then filters.

twist.text: Mobile apps mastered this: tap to expand, swipe to see more, long-press for advanced options.

climax.text: Progressive disclosure respects the user's cognitive budget and rewards exploration.

punchline.text: Don't show everything. Show the right thing at the right time.

quiz.question: What is progressive disclosure?
options: Gradually revealing complexity as users need it
